sentence: Company Participants Deborah Crawford - Vice President, Investor Relations Mark Zuckerberg - Chief Executive Officer Dave Wehner - Chief Financial Officer Susan Li - Vice President, Finance and Incoming Chief Financial Officer Marne Levine - Chief Business Officer Conference Call Participants Brian Nowak - Morgan Stanley Mark Shmulik - Bernstein Justin Post - Bank of America Doug Anmuth - JPMorgan Eric Sheridan - Goldman Sachs Youssef Squali - Truist Mark Mahaney - Evercore ISI Brent Thill - Jefferies Operator Good afternoon.
label: neutral

sentence: My name is Martin and I will be your conference operator today.
label: neutral

sentence: At this time, I would like to welcome everyone to the Meta Third Quarter Earnings Conference Call.
label: neutral

sentence: [Operator Instructions] This call will be recorded.
label: neutral

sentence: Thank you very much.
label: neutral

sentence: Ms. Deborah Crawford, Meta’s Vice President of Investor Relations, you may begin.
label: neutral

sentence: Deborah Crawford Thank you.
label: neutral

sentence: Good afternoon and welcome to Meta Platforms third quarter 2022 earnings conference call.
label: neutral

sentence: Joining me today to discuss our results are Mark Zuckerberg, CEO; and Dave Wehner, CFO.
label: neutral

sentence: Susan Li, VP of Finance and our Incoming CFO and Marne Levine, Chief Business Officer, are also on the call and will join Mark and Dave for the Q&A portion.
label: neutral

sentence: Before we get started, I would like to take this opportunity to remind you that our remarks today will include forward-looking statements.
label: neutral

sentence: Actual results may differ materially from those contemplated by these forward-looking statements.
label: neutral

sentence: Factors that could cause these results to differ materially are set forth in today’s press release and in our quarterly report on Form 10-Q filed with the SEC.
label: neutral

sentence: Any forward-looking statements that we make on this call are based on assumptions as of today and we undertake no obligation to update these statements as a result of new information or future events.
label: neutral

sentence: During this call, we may present both GAAP and non-GAAP financial measures.
label: neutral

sentence: A reconciliation of GAAP to non-GAAP measures is included in today’s earnings press release.
label: neutral

sentence: The press release and an accompanying investor presentation are available on our website at investor.fb.com.
label: neutral

sentence: And now, I’d like to turn the call over to Mark.
label: neutral

sentence: Mark Zuckerberg Hey, everyone.
label: neutral

sentence: Thanks for joining today.
label: neutral

sentence: Our community continued to grow this quarter.
label: positive

sentence: We now reach more than 3.7 billion people monthly across our Family of Apps.
label: positive

sentence: And while we continue to navigate some challenging dynamics of volatile macro economy, increasing competition, ad signal loss and growing costs from our long-term investments, I have to say that our product trends look better from what I see than some of the commentary I have seen suggests.
label: positive

sentence: There has been a bunch of speculation about engagement on our apps.
label: negative

sentence: And what we are seeing is more positive.
label: positive

sentence: On Facebook specifically, the number of people using the service each day is the highest it’s ever been, nearly 2 billion and engagement trends are strong.
label: positive

sentence: Instagram has more than 2 billion monthly actives.
label: positive

sentence: WhatsApp has more than 2 billion daily actives, also with the exciting trend that North America is now our fastest growing region.
label: positive

sentence: Across the family, some apps maybe saturated in some countries or some demographics, but overall, our apps continue to grow from a large base.
label: positive

sentence: We are also seeing engagement grow, especially strong growth in Reels.
label: positive

sentence: And I’ll share more details about that when I discuss our product priorities shortly.
label: neutral

sentence: In terms of our business, total revenue grew slightly this quarter on a constant currency basis.
label: positive

sentence: We are still behind where I think we should be, but we believe that we will return to healthier revenue growth trends next year.
label: positive

sentence: That said it’s not clear that the economy has stabilized yet.
label: negative

sentence: So we are planning our budget somewhat more conservatively.
label: negative

sentence: In 2023, we are going to focus our investments on a small number of high priority growth areas.
label: positive

sentence: So that means that some teams will grow meaningfully, but most other teams will stay flat or shrink over the next year.
label: neutral

sentence: In aggregate, we expect to end 2023 as either roughly the same size or even a slightly smaller organization than we are today.
label: neutral

sentence: Three of the primary areas we are going to focus on are our AI discovery engine that’s powering Reels and other recommendation experiences, our ads and business messaging platforms and our future vision for the metaverse.
label: neutral

sentence: The internal indications I have seen suggest we are doing leading work and are on the right track with these investments.
label: positive

sentence: So I think that we should keep investing heavily in these areas.
label: positive

sentence: As I have shared before, our goal is to grow Family of Apps operating income such that even with our AI infrastructure and Reality Labs investments, we can still meaningfully grow our overall company operating income in the long-term.
label: neutral

sentence: Our current surge in CapEx is largely due to building out our AI infrastructure and we would expect CapEx to come down as a percent of revenue over the long-term.
label: positive

sentence: We expect Reality Labs expenses will increase meaningfully again in 2023, with the biggest drivers of that being the launch of the next generation of our consumer Quest headset and hiring that has been done in 2022, but for which we are going to be paying the first full year of salaries next year.
label: negative

sentence: More broadly, beyond 2023, we expect to pace Reality Labs investments to ensure that we can achieve our goal of growing overall company operating income.
label: positive

sentence: Our capital allocation philosophy over the long-term is to allocate a portion of the profits generated from the Family of Apps towards these future-focused areas while enabling a greater return of capital to shareholders.
label: neutral

sentence: Alright.
label: neutral

sentence: Now I’d like to share some updates on the progress that we are seeing in these product areas.
label: neutral

sentence: Our AI discovery engine is playing an increasingly important role across our products, especially as advances enable us to recommend more interesting content from across our networks and feeds that used to be primarily driven just by the people and accounts you follow.
label: positive

sentence: So this, of course, includes Reels, which continues to grow quickly across our apps, both in production and consumption.
label: positive

sentence: There are now more than 140 billion Reels plays across Facebook and Instagram each day.
label: positive

sentence: That’s a 50% increase from 6 months ago.
label: positive

sentence: Reels is incremental to time spent on our apps.
label: positive

sentence: The trends look good here and we believe that we are gaining time spent share on competitors like TikTok.
label: positive

sentence: Over time, I expect a few things to set our products apart here.
label: neutral

sentence: First is that our discovery engine work allows us to recommend all types of content beyond Reels as well, including photos, text, links, communities, short and long-form videos and more.
label: neutral

sentence: Second is that we can mix this content along posts – alongside posts from your family and friends, which can’t be generated by AI alone.
label: neutral

sentence: And third is more social interactions move to messaging.
label: neutral

sentence: We are developing a flywheel between discovery and messaging that are going to make these apps stronger.
label: positive

sentence: On Instagram alone, people already reshare Reels 1 billion times a day through DMs.
label: positive

sentence: Moving to monetization, I’ve discussed in the past how the growth of short-form video creates near-term challenges since Reels doesn’t monetize at the rate of Feed or Stories yet.
label: negative

sentence: That means that as Reels grows, we are displacing revenue from higher monetizing surfaces.
label: negative

sentence: And I think this is clearly the right thing to do, so Reels can grow with the demand that we are seeing, but closing this gap is also a high priority.
label: positive

sentence: Even with the progress we have made, we are still choosing to take a more than $500 million quarterly revenue headwind with this shift, but we expect to get to a more neutral place over the next 10 – sort of 12 to 18 months.
label: negative

sentence: I mentioned last quarter that Instagram Reels had crossed a $1 billion annual revenue run-rate.
label: positive

sentence: We continue scaling monetization across both Instagram and Facebook and the combined run-rate across these apps is now $3 billion.
label: positive

sentence: Beyond Reels, messaging is another major monetization opportunity.
label: neutral

sentence: Billions of people and millions of businesses use WhatsApp and Messenger everyday and we are confident that we can connect them in ways that create valuable experiences.
label: positive

sentence: We started with click-to-messaging ads which lets businesses run ads on Facebook and Instagram that start a thread on Messenger, WhatsApp or Instagram Direct, so they can communicate with customers directly.
label: neutral

sentence: And this is one of our fastest growing ads products with a $9 billion annual run-rate.
label: positive

sentence: And this revenue is mostly on click to Messenger today since we started there first, but click to WhatsApp just passed a $1.5 billion run rate and growing more than 80% year-over-year.
label: positive

sentence: Paid messaging is another opportunity that we are starting to tap into.
label: positive

sentence: And it continues to grow quickly, but from a smaller base.
label: positive

sentence: We are putting the foundation in place now to scale this with key partnerships like Salesforce, which lets all businesses on their platform use WhatsApp as the main messaging service to answer customer questions and updates and sell directly in chat.
label: positive

sentence: And we also launched JioMart on WhatsApp in India, and it’s our first end-to-end shopping experience that shows the potential for chat-based commerce through messaging.
label: positive

sentence: So between click-to-messaging and paid messaging, I am confident that this is going to be a big opportunity.
label: positive

sentence: The last area that I want to discuss today is the metaverse.
label: neutral

sentence: We just had our Connect conference and announced Quest Pro, which we just started shipping.
label: positive

sentence: It’s our new high-end VR headset that delivers high-resolution mixed reality so you can blend virtual objects into the physical environment around you.
label: positive

sentence: It’s pretty amazing when you see it, and it’s going to enable all kinds of new experiences and socializing, gaming, fitness and work.
label: positive

sentence: And I am really looking forward to seeing what people build with this new capability.
label: positive

sentence: Work in the metaverse is a big theme for Quest Pro.
label: neutral

sentence: There are 200 million people who get new PCs every year, mostly for work.
label: neutral

sentence: And our goal for the Quest Pro line over the next several years is to enable more and more of these people to get their work done in virtual and mixed reality eventually even better than they could on PCs.
label: neutral

sentence: And to deliver a great work and productivity experience, I am excited about the partnerships that we announced with Microsoft, bringing their suite of productivity and enterprise management services to Quest; Adobe and Autodesk bringing their creative tools; Zoom bringing their communication platform; Accenture building solutions for enterprises and more.
label: positive

sentence: There is still a long road ahead to build the next computing platform, but we are clearly doing leading work here.
label: positive

sentence: This is a massive undertaking.
label: positive

sentence: And it’s often going to take a few versions of each product before they become mainstream, but I think that our work here is going to be of historic importance and create the foundation for an entirely new way that we will interact with each other and blend technology into our lives as well as the foundation for the long-term of our business.
label: positive

sentence: So between the AI discovery engine, our ads and business messaging platforms and our future vision for the metaverse, those are three of the areas that we are focused on.
label: neutral

sentence: I believe that the tougher prioritization, discipline and efficiency that we are driving across the organization will help us navigate the current environment and emerge an even stronger company.
label: positive

sentence: As always, I am grateful to everyone at Meta for your hard work and to all of you for being on this journey with us.
label: neutral

sentence: And with that, I am going to turn it over to Dave.
label: neutral

sentence: Dave Wehner Thanks, Mark and good afternoon, everyone.
label: neutral

sentence: Let’s begin with our consolidated results.
label: neutral

sentence: All comparisons are on a year-over-year basis, unless otherwise noted.
label: neutral

sentence: Q3 total revenue was $27.7 billion, down 4% or up 2% on a constant currency basis.
label: negative

sentence: Had foreign exchange rates remained constant with Q3 of last year, total revenue would have been approximately $1.8 billion higher.
label: negative

sentence: Q3 total expenses were $22.1 billion, up 19% compared to last year.
label: negative

sentence: This includes a $413 million impairment of certain operating leases as part of our ongoing work to align our office facilities footprint with our anticipated operating needs.
label: negative

sentence: In terms of the specific line items, cost of revenue decreased 1% as a reduction in Reality Labs hardware costs was offset by growth in infrastructure and content-related expenses.
label: positive

sentence: R&D increased 45% mainly driven by hiring within Family of Apps and Reality Labs segments as well as Reality Labs technology development costs.
label: negative

sentence: Lastly, marketing and sales and G&A increased 6% and 15% respectively, mainly driven by headcount-related costs.
label: negative

sentence: Our pace of hiring slowed in the third quarter, consistent with our previously stated plans.
label: negative

sentence: We added 3,700 net new hires in Q3, down from our Q2 net additions of 5,700 despite Q3 typically being a seasonally stronger hiring period.
label: negative

sentence: We expect hiring to slow dramatically going forward and to hold headcount roughly flat next year relative to current levels, which I will cover in my outlook section.
label: negative

sentence: Third quarter operating income was $5.7 billion, representing a 20% operating margin.
label: positive

sentence: Our tax rate was 21%.
label: neutral

sentence: Net income was $4.4 billion or $1.64 per share.
label: neutral

sentence: Capital expenditures, including principal payments on finance leases, were $9.5 billion driven by investments in servers, data centers and network infrastructure.
label: neutral

sentence: Free cash flow was $173 million.
label: neutral

sentence: We repurchased $6.5 billion of our Class A common stock in the third quarter and completed an inaugural debt offering of $10 billion.
label: positive

sentence: We ended the quarter with $41.8 billion in cash and marketable securities.
label: neutral

sentence: Moving now to our segment results, I’ll begin with our Family of Apps segment.
label: neutral

sentence: Our community across the Family of Apps continues to grow.
label: positive

sentence: We estimate that approximately 2.9 billion people used at least one of our Family of Apps on a daily basis in September and that approximately 3.7 billion people used at least one on a monthly basis.
label: neutral

sentence: Facebook continues to grow globally and engagement remains strong.
label: positive

sentence: Facebook daily active users were 1.98 billion, up 3% or 54 million compared to last year.
label: positive

sentence: DAUs represented approximately 67% of the 2.96 billion monthly active users in September.
label: neutral

sentence: MAUs grew 48 million or 2% compared to last year.
label: positive

sentence: Q3 total Family of Apps revenue was $27.4 billion, down 4%.
label: negative

sentence: Q3 Family of Apps ad revenue was $27.2 billion, down 4%, but up 3% on a constant currency basis.
label: negative

sentence: Consistent with our expectations, the headwind to year-over-year growth from Apple’s ATT changes diminished in Q3 as we lapped the first full quarter post the launch of iOS 14.5.
label: positive

sentence: However, this was offset by weak advertising demand, which we believe continues to be impacted by the uncertain and volatile macroeconomic landscape.
label: negative

sentence: As a result, our Q3 constant currency growth rate was in line with our Q2 rate.
label: neutral

sentence: The healthcare and travel verticals were the largest positive contributors to growth in Q3.
label: positive

sentence: However, this was offset by continued softness in other verticals, including online commerce, gaming, financial services and CPG.
label: negative

sentence: On an advertiser size basis, revenue growth from large advertisers remains challenged, while we have seen more resilience among smaller advertisers.
label: negative

sentence: Foreign currency was a significant headwind to advertising revenue growth in all international regions.
label: negative

sentence: On a user geography basis, year-over-year ad revenue growth was strongest in Asia-Pacific and rest of world at 6% and 3% respectively, with both regions continuing to benefit meaningfully from strong growth in click-to-messaging ads.
label: positive

sentence: North America and Europe declined 3% and 16% respectively.
label: negative

sentence: In Q3, the total number of ad impressions served across our services increased 17% and the average price per ad decreased 18%.
label: positive

sentence: Impression growth was driven by Asia-Pacific and rest of world.
label: positive

sentence: The year-over-year decline in pricing was primarily driven by strong impression growth, especially from lower monetizing surfaces and regions, foreign currency depreciation and lower advertiser demand.
label: positive

sentence: Family of Apps other revenue was $192 million, up 9%, driven by strong business messaging growth from our WhatsApp business platform, partially offset by a decline in other line items.
label: positive

sentence: We continue to direct the majority of our investments towards the development and operation of our Family of Apps.
label: neutral

sentence: In Q3, Family of Apps expenses were $18.1 billion, representing 82% of our overall expenses.
label: neutral

sentence: FoA expenses grew 18% driven mostly by employee-related costs, infrastructure-related costs and the impairment of certain operating leases for office facilities that we plan to exit.
label: negative

sentence: Family of Apps operating income was $9.3 billion, representing a 34% operating margin.
label: neutral

sentence: Within our Reality Labs segment, Q3 revenue was $285 million, down 49% due to lower Quest 2 sales.
label: negative

sentence: Reality Labs expenses were $4 billion, up 24% due primarily to employee-related costs and technology development expenses.
label: negative

sentence: Reality Labs operating loss was $3.7 billion.
label: negative

sentence: Turning now to the outlook, we expect fourth quarter total revenue to be in the range of $30 billion to $32.5 billion.
label: neutral

sentence: Our guidance assumes foreign currency will be an approximately 7% headwind to year-over-year total revenue growth in the fourth quarter based on current exchange rates.
label: negative

sentence: Before turning to the expense outlook, I wanted to provide some context on the approach we are taking towards setting our 2023 budget.
label: neutral

sentence: We are making significant changes across the board to operate more efficiently.
label: positive

sentence: We are holding some teams flat in terms of headcount, shrinking others and investing headcount growth only in our highest priorities.
label: positive

sentence: As a result, we expect headcount at the end of 2023 will be approximately in line with third quarter 2022 levels.
label: neutral

sentence: We have increased scrutiny on all areas of operating expenses.
label: positive

sentence: However, these moves follow a substantial investment cycle, so they will take time to play out in terms of our overall expense trajectory.
label: negative

sentence: Some steps, like the ongoing rationalization of our office footprint, will lead to incremental costs in the near-term.
label: negative

sentence: This should set us up well for future years when we expect to return to higher rates of revenue growth.
label: positive

sentence: Turning now to the specific expense outlook for ’22 and ’23, we expect 2022 total expenses to be in the range of $85 billion to $87 billion updated from our prior outlook of $85 billion to $88 billion.
label: neutral

sentence: This includes an estimated $900 million in additional charges in Q4 related to consolidating our office facilities footprint that we expect to record in the fourth quarter of 2022.
label: neutral

sentence: We anticipate our full year 2023 total expenses will be in the range of $96 billion to $101 billion.
label: neutral

sentence: This includes an estimated $2 billion in charges related to consolidating our office facilities footprint.
label: neutral

sentence: We expect the slight majority of our 2023 expense dollar growth to be driven by operating expenses, with the remaining growth coming from cost of revenue.
label: neutral

sentence: We expect the percentage growth rate of 2023 operating expenses to decelerate meaningfully as we curtail non-headcount related expense growth and keep 2023 headcount roughly flat with current levels.
label: negative

sentence: Conversely, our growth in cost of revenue is expected to accelerate driven by infrastructure-related expenses, and to a lesser extent, Reality Labs hardware costs driven by the launch of our next generation of our consumer Quest headset later next year.
label: negative

sentence: Reality Labs expenses are included in our total expense guidance.
label: neutral

sentence: We do anticipate that Reality Labs operating losses in 2023 will grow significantly year-over-year.
label: negative

sentence: Beyond 2023, we expect to pace Reality Labs investments such that we can achieve our goal of growing overall company operating income in the long run.
label: positive

sentence: Before turning to our CapEx outlook, I’d like to provide some context on our infrastructure investment approach.
label: neutral

sentence: We are currently going through an investment cycle, which is being driven – which is primarily driven by two large areas of investment.
label: neutral

sentence: First, we are significantly expanding our AI capacity.
label: positive

sentence: These investments are driving substantially all of our capital expenditure growth in 2023.
label: positive

sentence: There is some increased capital intensity that comes with moving more of our infrastructure to AI.
label: neutral

sentence: It requires more expensive servers and networking equipment, and we are building new data centers specifically equipped to support next-generation AI hardware.
label: positive

sentence: We expect these investments to provide us a technology advantage and unlock meaningful improvements across many of our key initiatives, including Feed, Reels and Ads.
label: positive

sentence: We are carefully evaluating the return we achieved from these investments, which will inform the scale of our AI investment beyond 2023.
label: neutral

sentence: Second, we are making ongoing investments in our data center footprint.
label: neutral

sentence: In recent years, we have stepped up our investment in bringing more data center capacity online.
label: neutral

sentence: And that work is ongoing in 2023.
label: neutral

sentence: We believe the additional data center capacity will provide us greater flexibility with the types of servers we purchase and allow us to use them for longer, which we expect to generate greater cost efficiencies over time.
label: positive

sentence: These investments, along with revenue headwinds, are contributing to higher capital expenditures as a percentage of revenue in 2022 and 2023 than we expect over the long-term.
label: negative

sentence: Turning now to the specific CapEx outlook for ’22 and ’23.
label: neutral

sentence: We expect 2022 capital expenditures, including principal payments on finance leases, to be in the range of $32 billion to $33 billion updated from our prior range of $30 billion to $34 billion.
label: neutral

sentence: For 2023, we expect capital expenditures to be in the range of $34 billion to $39 billion driven by our investments in data center servers and network infrastructure.
label: neutral

sentence: An increase in AI capacity is driving substantially all of our capital expenditure growth in 2023.
label: neutral

sentence: Turning to tax.
label: neutral

sentence: Absent any changes to U.S. tax law, we expect our fourth quarter 2022 and our full year 2023 tax rate to be similar to the third quarter 2022 rate.
label: neutral

sentence: In addition, as noted on previous calls, we continue to monitor developments regarding the viability of transatlantic data transfers and their potential impact on our European operations.
label: neutral

sentence: In closing, we are pleased with the growth of the community using our Family of Apps and the engagement improvements we are driving with efforts such as Reels and our AI-powered content recommendations.
label: positive

sentence: While we are facing near-term headwinds on revenue, the fundamentals are there for a return to stronger top line growth.
label: positive

sentence: We are approaching 2023 with a focus on efficiency and spending discipline, and I’m optimistic that these moves will set us up well to achieve our goal of driving operating income growth over the long-term while investing for future growth.
label: positive

sentence: On a personal note, I’ll be closing out a decade at Meta in the next couple of weeks, including the last 8 years as CFO.
label: neutral

sentence: In my new role, I’m looking forward to continuing to help the company achieve its long-term mission and execute on its financial plan.
label: positive

sentence: I couldn’t be happier to hand off the CFO role to Susan Li, who is one of the most talented executives that I’ve had a chance to work with in my long career in finance and tech.
label: positive
